about_the_game: This game is an intense and exciting shooting game where players wield a black gun, battling across an expansive wilderness under a clear blue sky. The game’s visuals are simple yet refined, with a beautiful natural landscape of green grass and distant mountains set against a backdrop of blue sky and white clouds. Players use the ASDW keys to control their character's movements within the scene and the left mouse button to aim and shoot at the floating black cube enemies. Though these enemies have a simple form, their random appearances and directions add to the game’s challenge. The background music is tight and exhilarating, with each successful shot accompanied by a crisp gunfire sound, enhancing the realism of the combat. Who can survive in this vast expanse and emerge as the ultimate victor? This game tests not only the player's reflexes but also their strategic planning abilities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
